title: Answer: DEPENDS!
text: Muslim women choose to wear a tudong or hijab for many reasons. Some see it as a sign of passage into adulthood. Others wear it to identify themselves as Muslim and show cultural pride. Many also wear the covering to value family traditions or local customs. Of course, many Muslim women choose not to wear one. Others choose to only wear it for religious occasions.
